channel.title: Adding shop issues
channel.description:
I have managed to add a shopkeep npc into the server. I want to have the npc sell various items, but it appears that something is wrong. I click on him and nothing occurs. This is my setup. In shops cfg. (Though the [TAB] and [SPACE] are not actually typed in like this)
//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item---- Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount-- Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item---- Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop[SPACE]=[SPACE]1[TAB]shop[TAB]2[TAB]2[TAB]4151[TAB]10 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
And my config.
if(NPCID == 561){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; }
Anything I have done wrong?

item.title: Adding shop issues
item.dc:creator: @Foundationrepair Foundationrepair
item.description:
@Foundationrepair wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:4, topic:459130”]You haven’t added a shop with the ID number of 1 to the config file, so it won’t work. Add something like this

shop = 1 2 2 ITEMID ITEMAMMOUNT ITEMID ITEMAMMOUNT//etc..[/quote]

But I actually have. Here is what I currently have it as (As I took segaxvi’s advice and re-made it all)

shop = 1 Shop 2 2 4151 10

I have even tried it without having a shop name, just to make sure the template is not setup incorrectly.
Like thus.

shop = 5 2 2 4151 10

Still no good.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding shop issues
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

You haven’t added a shop with the ID number of 1 to the config file, so it won’t work. Add something like this

shop = 1 2 2 ITEMID ITEMAMMOUNT ITEMID ITEMAMMOUNT//etc..

Read full topic

item.title: Adding shop issues
item.dc:creator: @Foundationrepair Foundationrepair
item.description:
@Foundationrepair wrote:

My source is a blank delta, so there was not an npc that worked to begin with.
I still tried your suggestion, I changed the npc, the position and the store id, ect.
Still no use.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding shop issues
item.dc:creator: @segaxvi segaxvi
item.description:
@segaxvi wrote:

[quote=“Foundationrepair, post:1, topic:459130”]I have managed to add a shopkeep npc into the server. I want to have the npc sell various items, but it appears that something is wrong. I click on him and nothing occurs.

This is my setup.
In shops cfg. (Though the [TAB] and [SPACE] are not actually typed in like this)

[quote]//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----

Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–

Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----

Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount
shop[SPACE]=[SPACE]1[TAB]shop[TAB]2[TAB]2[TAB]4151[TAB]10
[ENDOFSHOPLIST][/quote]

And my config.

[quote]if(NPCID == 561){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;
}[/quote]

Anything I have done wrong?[/quote]

Get a NPC that is already working and just change the items and everything there and compile, Save time and means no confusment.

Read full topic
